text: Cocaine Wars is a 1985 Argentine American action movie directed by Héctor Olivera and starring John Schneider, Federico Luppi, Royal Dano, Rodolfo Ranni, Kathryn Witt, Ivan Grey, Richard Hamlin, Edgar Moore. == Other websites == * * * Category:1985 action movies Category:Argentine action movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies directed by Héctor Olivera
title: Cocaine Wars
